channel.title: New Server. i need help with it!
channel.description: i made a server and i tried to log in but i logged out but the server file got my info so i ranked my self 3 as owner and i tried to log in and i keep logging out. please help me! and is adding your port # and server name to firewall portforwarding?

item.title: New Server. i need help with it!
item.dc:creator: @rune-pure rune-pure
item.description:
@rune-pure wrote:

Port forwarding is when you add your ip in your adress so you can config it.

ONly if you have a wireless router.

Also try adding as rights 2. Or switch clients.

Read full topic
